network
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  network.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The Server takes requests from remote clients to start a new console game and allocates a new service thread to the client to play the game.

Method Summary
static Server getInstance()
          Returns the singleton instance of the server.
 void run()
          While the server is running, it will accept requests from remote clients and allocate service threads to each request.
 void startServer(int portNr)
          Connects to the server socket and starts the server thread.
 void stopServer()
          Stops the server and closes the server socket.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
